name: Time Paradox (itch)
description:
' The concrete walls, the weird creatures and a horrible dystopic world" , Ellen a grad student, living in her small home in the city, wakes up everyday in her sleep to this nightmare. Is this just a bad dream or does it hold something more . The dream tends to feel real by each day. Can Nomi Chapman, her true friend who works at the famous T.I.M.E laboratories, help her battle through the nightmare or Is Doctor Desmond Pike her mentor and guardian, hiding something dark and has the answers to her visions. The fate of Ellen Sans unfolds today when she wakes up to the nightmare one last time. Travel with Ellen to see a story, unravel through the mysteries of time and space.

This game was a classroom project of our module Media and Technology at the National Institute of Design, Gandhinagar. This was a team project and our group consisted of Md. Aasif Anwar , Urvi and Tauqeer Ahmed
